languages.text: "Отец рассказывал, что чувствовал подобное, когда встретил матушку". {n}Маттис скользит взглядом по чертам Кибеллы и грустно улыбается.{/n} "Я верю, что мое будущее ждет меня там".

traits.locale_text: "Отец рассказывал мне, что чувствовал подобное, когда встретил матушку. "Она предназначена мне судьбой", — так он говорил. А я... Я словно ищу часть себя, которую давно потерял". {n}Маттис скользит взглядом по чертам Кибеллы и грустно улыбается.{/n} "Предвосхищая ваш вопрос: мои поиски второстепенны перед служением династии. Слово дома Эрэбис!"

languages.text: "My father told me he had felt something of the sort when he met my mother." {n}Mattis's eyes take in Kibellah's features. He smiles sadly.{/n} "I believe my future awaits me there."
languages.original_text: "Отец рассказывал, что чувствовал подобное, когда встретил матушку". {n}Маттис скользит взглядом по чертам Кибеллы и грустно улыбается.{/n} "Я верю, что мое будущее ждет меня там".

traits.locale_text: "My father told me he had felt something of the sort when he met mother." {n}Mattis runs his eyes over Kibellah's features. He smiles sadly.{/n} "I believe my future awaits me there."
"My father told me he had felt something of the sort when he met mother." {n}Mattis runs his eyes over Kibellah's features. He smiles sadly.{/n} "I believe my future awaits me there."
"My father told me he had felt something of the sort when he met my mother." {n}Mattis's eyes take in Kibellah's features. He smiles sadly.{/n} "I believe my future awaits me there."
"My father told me he had felt something of the sort when he met my mother." {n}Mattis's eyes take in Kibellah's features. He smiles sadly.{/n} "I believe my future awaits me there."
"My father told me he had felt something of the sort when he met my mother." {n}Mattis's eyes take in Kibellah's features. He smiles sadly.{/n} "I believe my future awaits me there."
"My father told me he had felt something of the sort when he met my mother." {n}Mattis's eyes take in Kibellah's features. He smiles sadly.{/n} "I believe my future awaits me there."

languages.text: « Mon père m'a dit avoir ressenti quelque chose de ce genre quand il a rencontré ma mère. » {n}Mattis dévisage longuement Kibellah, comme pour graver ses traits dans sa mémoire. Il esquisse un sourire triste.{/n} « Je pense que mon avenir est ici. »
languages.original_text: "My father told me he had felt something of the sort when he met my mother." {n}Mattis's eyes take in Kibellah's features. He smiles sadly.{/n} "I believe my future awaits me there."

traits.locale_text: « Mon père m'a dit avoir ressenti quelque chose de ce genre quand il a rencontré ma mère. » {n}Mattis dévisage longuement Kibellah, comme pour graver ses traits dans sa mémoire. Il esquisse un sourire triste.{/n} « Je pense que mon avenir est ici. »

languages.text: «Mi padre me contó que sintió algo parecido cuando conoció a mi madre». {n}Mattis mira a Kibellah con una sonrisa triste.{/n} «Creo que mi futuro me espera allí».
languages.original_text: "My father told me he had felt something of the sort when he met my mother." {n}Mattis's eyes take in Kibellah's features. He smiles sadly.{/n} "I believe my future awaits me there."

traits.locale_text: «Mi padre me contó que sintió algo parecido cuando conoció a mi madre». {n}Mattis mira a Kibellah con una sonrisa triste.{/n} «Creo que mi futuro me espera allí».

languages.text: 「父は母に会ったとき、そのようなものを感じたと言いました」{n}マティスの目がキベラの顔をとらえた。彼は悲しげに微笑む。{/n}「そこで私の未来が待っていると信じています」
languages.original_text: "My father told me he had felt something of the sort when he met my mother." {n}Mattis's eyes take in Kibellah's features. He smiles sadly.{/n} "I believe my future awaits me there."

traits.locale_text: 「父は母に会ったとき、そのようなものを感じたと言いました」{n}マティスの目がキベラの顔をとらえた。彼は悲しげに微笑む。{/n}「そこで私の未来が待っていると信じています」

languages.text: “我的父亲告诉我，说当他见到我母亲的时候，他也体会到了这种感觉。”{n}马蒂斯仔细地看着绮贝菈的容貌，露出了悲伤的笑容。{/n}“我相信，我的未来就在这艘船上等着我。”
languages.original_text: "My father told me he had felt something of the sort when he met my mother." {n}Mattis's eyes take in Kibellah's features. He smiles sadly.{/n} "I believe my future awaits me there."

traits.locale_text: “我的父亲告诉我，说当他见到我母亲的时候，他也体会到了这种感觉。”{n}马蒂斯仔细地看着绮贝菈的容貌，露出了悲伤的笑容。{/n}“我相信，我的未来就在这艘船上等着我。”

languages.text: "Mein Vater hat mir erzählt, er hätte etwas Ähnliches empfunden, als er meine Mutter kennenlernte." {n}Mattis' Blick nimmt Kibellahs Züge wahr. Er lächelt traurig.{/n} "Ich glaube, dass mich dort meine Zukunft erwartet."
languages.original_text: "My father told me he had felt something of the sort when he met my mother." {n}Mattis's eyes take in Kibellah's features. He smiles sadly.{/n} "I believe my future awaits me there."

traits.locale_text: "Mein Vater hat mir erzählt, er hätte etwas Ähnliches empfunden, als er meine Mutter kennenlernte." {n}Mattis' Blick nimmt Kibellahs Züge wahr. Er lächelt traurig.{/n} "Ich glaube, dass mich dort meine Zukunft erwartet."

languages.text: "Babam, bana annemle tanıştığında bu tarz bir hisse kapıldığını anlatmıştı." {n}Mattis'in gözleri, Kibellah'nın yüz hatlarını süzüyor. Kederle gülümsüyor.{/n} "Geleceğimin beni burada beklediğine inanıyorum."
languages.original_text: "My father told me he had felt something of the sort when he met my mother." {n}Mattis's eyes take in Kibellah's features. He smiles sadly.{/n} "I believe my future awaits me there."
